metadata.title: CVE-2023-41102 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the captive portal in OpenNDS before version10.1.3. It has multiple memory leaks due to not freeing up allocatedmemory. This may lead to a Denial-of-Service condition due to theconsumption of all available memory. Affected OpenNDS before version 10.1.3fixed in OpenWrt master and OpenWrt 23.05 on 23. November by updatingOpenNDS to version 10.2.0.

criterions.comment: opennds package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
